title: 'The loss of young lives is a scourge on society, it will take all of us to win'
description: Idris Elba has launched the new Don't Stop Your Future campaign in today's newspaper and the country could come together to say enough is enough

title: Pressure mounts on government to FINALLY compensate victims of Post Office scandal - as Prime Minister hints ALL wrongly accused postmasters will be exonerated
description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak raised hopes of a significant breakthrough as he hinted that all sub-postmasters convicted in the fiasco could soon be exonerated. So far, only a fraction have been formally cleared. Justice Secretary Alex Chalk said last night ...

title: PM urged to order probe into whether MP’s expenses broke ministerial code
description: Labour said Rishi Sunak’s ethics adviser should look into claims Paul Maynard used his taxpayer-funded constituency office for political campaigning.

title: Rishi Sunak slams Keir Starmer as having ‘no plan’ as he kicks off months of general election campaigning

title: Rishi Sunak to crackdown on numbers eligible for benefits
description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has spoken about cracking down on number of people eligible for benefits while on BBC's Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg.

title: Rishi Sunak transforms into irritable, can-I-finish Corbyn
description: The prime minister became increasingly annoyed as he was questioned over leaked correspondence about the Rwanda scheme

title: Rishi Sunak says government 'looking at' exonerating subpostmasters in Horizon scandal
description: Scotland Yard said on Friday evening that officers are 'investigating potential fraud offences arising out of these prosecutions'

title: Rishi Sunak meets residents during visit to flood-hit Oxford
description: Rishi Sunak spoke to residents on their doorsteps in Oxford on Sunday before telling Environment Agency (EA) workers during a visit at their depot on Osney Island that “touch wood, we’re past the worst of it”.

title: Sunak vows to ‘continue to confront difficult challenges’ as Parliament returns
description: A Downing Street source said the Prime Minister was determined to ‘not take the easy way out’ in a year that is likely to see a general election.

title: Ministers ‘flying blind’ over economy as Sunak and Hunt promise tax cuts
description: The Treasury has not received the first draft of the Office for Budget Responsibility's updated fiscal forecast

title: Rishi Sunak insists he'll meet his pledge to cut NHS waiting lists when there are no more strikes as junior doctors continue their six-day walkout
description: The Prime Minister said he had 'confidence' that an end to industrial action would allow him to meet one of his five key promises to voters.

title: Rishi Sunak Blasted For 'Selling Nonsense' By Former Top Government Adviser
description: Rishi Sunak has been accused of “selling nonsense” to voters by a former top government adviser. Baronness Casey - who served as the UK’s first Victims Commissioner - said she was “angry and upset” at the prime minister. It came after Sunak gave an interview to BBC’s Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg programme.

title: 5 key moments from Rishi Sunak's interview with Laura Kuenssberg
description: From NHS waiting lists to a potential exodus of Tory MPs, here are the key moments from Rishi Sunak's BBC interview on Sunday.

title: Rishi Sunak gets in flap as he's taunted by Mirror Chicken for chickening out of election
description: The Prime Minister tried to dodge our feathered friend as he arrived at the BBC for an interview with Laura Kuennsberg just days after he chickened out of a general election
